translated: is not the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the feeling that arises from the condition of thinking-mind contact

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
translated: is not the feeling that arises from the condition of thinking-mind contact.

original: sa'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the earth element

original: sa'i khams ma yin no //
analyzed: sa'i khams ma yin no //
translated: is not the earth element.

original: chu'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the water element is as follows.

original: chu'i khams ma yin no //üîΩme'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chu'i khams ma yin no // me'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the water element is not the water element.

original: me'i khams ma yin no //üîΩrlung gi khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: me'i khams ma yin no // rlung gi khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the fire element is not the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams ma yin no //üîΩnam mkha'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rlung gi khams ma yin no // nam mkha'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the wind element is not the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams ma yin no //üîΩrnam par shes pa'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin @522b pa de ni /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ma yin no // rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin @522b pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the space element is not the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no //üîΩma rig pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no // ma rig pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the consciousness element is not the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa ma yin no //üîΩ'du byed kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ma rig pa ma yin no // 'du byed kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of ignorance is not ignorance.

original: 'du byed ma yin no //üîΩrnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'du byed ma yin no // rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of volitional factors is not volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa ma yin no //üîΩming dang gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma yin no // ming dang gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of consciousness is not consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs ma yin no //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ma yin no //
translated: The profundity of name and form is not name and form.

original: skye mched drug gi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the six sense spheres is as follows.

original: skye mched drug ma yin no //üîΩreg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: skye mched drug ma yin no // reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the six sense spheres is not the six sense spheres.

original: reg pa ma yin no //üîΩtshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: reg pa ma yin no // tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of contact is not contact.

original: tshor ba ma yin no //üîΩsred pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshor ba ma yin no // sred pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of feeling is not feeling.

original: sred pa ma yin no //üîΩlen pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sred pa ma yin no // len pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of craving is not craving.

original: len pa ma yin no //üîΩsrid pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: len pa ma yin no // srid pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of grasping is not grasping.

original: srid pa ma yin no //üîΩskye ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: srid pa ma yin no // skye ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of existence is not existence.

original: skye ba ma yin no //üîΩrga shi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: skye ba ma yin no // rga shi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of birth is not birth.

original: rga shi ma yin no //üîΩsbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rga shi ma yin no // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of old age and death is not old age and death.üîΩThe profundity of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of generosity.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no; ;tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no; ;tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the perfection of discipline is not the perfection of discipline.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: it is not the perfection of morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity that is the perfection of patience

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: is not the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity that is the perfection of effort

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //üîΩbsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid @523a *//
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid @523a *//
translated: is not the perfection of effort.

original: gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity that is the perfection of concentration

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: is not the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity that is the perfection of wisdom

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity that is inner emptiness

original: nang stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity that is outer emptiness

original: phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of the outer and inner is as follows.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩstong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of the external and the internal is not the emptiness of the external and the internal.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩchen po stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no // chen po stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of emptiness is not the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩdon dam pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no // don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of the great is not the emptiness of the great.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of ultimate reality is not the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩ'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of the conditioned is not the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩmtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of the unconditioned is not the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of what transcends limits is not the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is as follows.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩdor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is not the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of non-rejection is not the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /üîΩrang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin @523b no; ;chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin @523b no; ;chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of nature is not the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩrang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of specific characteristics is not the emptiness of specific characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of non-apprehension is not the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of nonthings is as follows.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of non-things is not the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩdngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of essential nature is not the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩdran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things is not the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin no //üîΩyang dag par spong ba rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin no // yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the applications of mindfulness is not the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no //üîΩrdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the right efforts is not the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The profundity of the legs of manifestation is not the legs of manifestation.

original: dbang po rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the faculties is as follows.

original: dbang po rnams ma yin no //üîΩstobs rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dbang po rnams ma yin no // stobs rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the faculties is not the faculties.

original: stobs rnams ma yin no //üîΩbyang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: stobs rnams ma yin no // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the powers is not the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no //üîΩ'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the branches of enlightenment is not the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma @524a *//üîΩyin no // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma @524a *// yin no // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the noble eightfold path is not the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no //üîΩbsam gtan rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no // bsam gtan rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the noble truths is not the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams ma yin no //üîΩtshad med pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ma yin no // tshad med pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the concentrations is not the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The profundity of the immeasurables is not the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the formless meditative attainments is as follows.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no //üîΩrnam par thar pa brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no // rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the formless meditative attainments is not the formless meditative attainments.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no //üîΩmthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the eight liberations is not the eight liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no //üîΩrnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the nine serial meditative attainments is not the nine serial meditative attainments.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no //üîΩmngon par shes pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no // mngon par shes pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation is not the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The profundity of the superknowledges is not the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the concentrations.üîΩ

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no //üîΩgzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no // gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the meditative stabilities is not the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no //üîΩde bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways is not the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no //üîΩmi 'jigs @524b pa bzhi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no // mi 'jigs @524b pa bzhi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas is not the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no //üîΩso so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the four fearlessnesses is not the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no; ;snying rje chen po'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no; ;snying rje chen po'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is not the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: snying rje chen po ma yin no //üîΩsangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: snying rje chen po ma yin no // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of great compassion is not great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The profundity of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is not the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.üîΩThe profundity of the knowledge of paths is not the knowledge of paths.üîΩThe profundity of the knowledge of all bases is not the knowledge of all bases.üîΩThe profundity of the knowledge of all entities is not the knowledge of all entities.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The profundity of the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /

original: tshor ba ma yin no //üîΩ'du shes kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshor ba ma yin no // 'du shes kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in feelings is not feelings.

original: 'du shes ma yin no //üîΩ'du byed kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'du shes ma yin no // 'du byed kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in perceptions is not perceptions.

original: 'du byed ma yin no //üîΩrnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'du byed ma yin no // rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in formations is not formations.

original: rnam par shes pa ma yin no //üîΩmig gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma yin no // mig gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in consciousness is not consciousness.

original: mig ma yin no //üîΩrna ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mig ma yin no // rna ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in the eyes is not the eyes.

original: rna ba ma yin no //üîΩsna'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rna ba ma yin no // sna'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in the ears is not the ears.

original: sna ma yin no //üîΩlce'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sna ma yin no // lce'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in the nose is not the nose.

original: lce ma yin no //üîΩlus kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /üîΩlus ma yin @529b no; ;yid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lce ma yin no // lus kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni / lus ma yin @529b no; ;yid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in the tongue is not the tongue.üîΩThat which is difficult to fathom in the body is not the body.

original: yid ma yin no //
analyzed: yid ma yin no //
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in the mind is not the mind.

original: gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of form is difficult to fathom.üîΩ

original: gzugs ma yin no //üîΩsgra'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzugs ma yin no // sgra'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of form is not form.

original: sgra ma yin no //üîΩdri'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sgra ma yin no // dri'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of sound is not sound.

original: dri ma yin no //üîΩro'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dri ma yin no // ro'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of smell is not smell.

original: ro ma yin no //üîΩreg gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ro ma yin no // reg gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of taste is not taste.

original: reg ma yin no //üîΩchos kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: reg ma yin no // chos kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of touch is not touch.

original: chos ma yin no //üîΩmig gi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /üîΩmig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos ma yin no // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni / mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: The profundity of mental phenomena is not mental phenomena.üîΩThe profundity of eye consciousness is not eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /üîΩrna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no //üîΩsna'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of ear consciousness is not ear consciousness.üîΩThe profundity of nose consciousness is not nose consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
translated: The profundity of tongue consciousness is not tongue consciousness.üîΩThe profundity of body consciousness is not body consciousness.üîΩThe profundity of mind consciousness is not mind consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of the tongue consciousness is difficult to fathom.üîΩ

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no //üîΩlus kyi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no // lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of the tongue consciousness is not the tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no //üîΩyid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of the body consciousness is not the body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no //üîΩmig gi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of the mind consciousness is not the mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
translated: The depth of eye contact is not eye contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te @530a *//üîΩreg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /üîΩsna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //üîΩlce'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te @530a *// reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of ear contact is not ear contact.üîΩThe depth of nose contact is not nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //
translated: The depth of tongue contact is not tongue contact.üîΩThe depth of body contact is not body contact.üîΩThe depth of mind contact is not mind contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of the composite of physical contact is difficult to fathom.üîΩ

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //üîΩyid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The difficulty in fathoming physical contact is not physical contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no //üîΩmig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The difficulty in fathoming mental contact is not mental contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The difficulty in fathoming the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is not the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //üîΩsna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The difficulty in fathoming the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is not the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //
translated: The difficulty in fathoming the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact is not the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.üîΩThe difficulty in fathoming the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact is not the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of the experience of the condition of feeling that arises from the contact of the tongue is difficult to fathom.üîΩ

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //üîΩlus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //üîΩyid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the body is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma @530b yin no //üîΩsa'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma @530b yin no // sa'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the mind is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the mind.

original: sa'i khams ma yin no //üîΩchu'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sa'i khams ma yin no // chu'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of the earth element is not the earth element.

original: chu'i khams ma yin no //üîΩme'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chu'i khams ma yin no // me'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of the water element is not the water element.

original: me'i khams ma yin no //
analyzed: me'i khams ma yin no //
translated: The depth of the fire element is not the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The unfathomable depth of the element of windüîΩ

original: rlung gi khams ma yin no //üîΩnam mkha'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rlung gi khams ma yin no // nam mkha'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of the wind element is not the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams ma yin no //üîΩrnam par shes pa'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ma yin no // rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of the space element is not the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no //üîΩma rig pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no // ma rig pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of the consciousness element is not the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa ma yin no //üîΩ'du byed kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ma rig pa ma yin no // 'du byed kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of ignorance is not ignorance.

original: 'du byed ma yin no //üîΩrnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'du byed ma yin no // rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of volitional factors is not volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa ma yin no //üîΩming dang gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma yin no // ming dang gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of consciousness is not consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs ma yin no //üîΩskye mched drug gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ma yin no // skye mched drug gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of name and form is not name and form.

original: skye mched drug ma yin no //
analyzed: skye mched drug ma yin no //
translated: The depth of the six sense spheres is not the six sense spheres.

original: reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of touch is difficult to fathom.üîΩ

original: reg pa ma yin no //üîΩtshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: reg pa ma yin no // tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in contact is not contact.

original: tshor ba ma yin no //üîΩsred pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshor ba ma yin no // sred pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in feeling is not feeling.

original: sred pa ma yin no //üîΩlen pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sred pa ma yin no // len pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in craving is not craving.

original: len pa ma yin no //üîΩsrid pa'i gting dpag dka' @531a *//üîΩba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: len pa ma yin no // srid pa'i gting dpag dka' @531a *// ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in appropriation is not appropriation.

original: srid pa ma yin no //üîΩskye ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: srid pa ma yin no // skye ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in existence is not existence.

original: skye ba ma yin no //üîΩrga shi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: skye ba ma yin no // rga shi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in birth is not birth.

original: rga shi ma yin no //üîΩsbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rga shi ma yin no // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in old age and death is not old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in the perfection of moral discipline is not the perfection of moral discipline.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //üîΩbzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: it is not the perfection of morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //üîΩbrtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the perfection of patience is not the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //üîΩbsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the perfection of perseverance is not the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //üîΩshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the perfection of concentration is not the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //üîΩnang stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /üîΩnang stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no // nang stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni / nang stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The profundity of the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom.üîΩThe profundity of inner emptiness is not inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of outer emptiness is not outer emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: It is not external emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of external and internal

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of external and internal.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of emptiness

original: stong pa @531b nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: stong pa @531b nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of great extent

original: chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of great extent.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of ultimate reality

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The depth of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is difficult to fathom.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩthog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of the unlimited is not the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is not the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni; dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩrang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni; dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no // rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of non-dispersal is not the emptiness of non-dispersal.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩchos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no // chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of inherent existence is not the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of specific characteristics is not the emptiness of specific characteristics.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of non-apprehension

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin @532a *//üîΩpa de ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin @532a *// pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of non-entities

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of non-entities.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the emptiness of essential nature

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the applications of mindfulness

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ma yin no //
translated: is not the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the right effortsüîΩis not the right efforts.

original: yang dag par spong ba ma yin no //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba ma yin no //
translated: are not the four right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /

original: dbang po'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dbang po'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /

original: dbang po ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po ma yin no //
translated: is not the faculties.

original: stobs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: stobs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /

original: stobs ma yin no //
analyzed: stobs ma yin no //
translated: is not the powers.

analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /

original: byang chub kyi yan lag ma yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag ma yin no //

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /

analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no //

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The difficulty of fathoming the noble truths

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa ma yin no //

original: bsam gtan gyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The difficulty of fathoming the concentrations

original: bsam gtan ma yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan ma yin no //
translated: is not the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshad med pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: It is immeasurable and difficult to fathom.

original: tshad med pa ma yin no //üîΩgzugs @532b med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshad med pa ma yin no // gzugs @532b med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in the immeasurables is not the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ma yin no //üîΩrnam par thar pa brgyad kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ma yin no // rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in the formless concentrations is not the formless concentrations.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no //üîΩmthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in the eight liberations is not the eight liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no //üîΩrnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in the nine serial absorptions is not the nine serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no //
translated: That which is difficult to fathom in the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation is not the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: It is difficult to fathom the depths of supernormal knowledge.üîΩ

original: mngon par shes pa ma yin no //üîΩting nge 'dzin gyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa ma yin no // ting nge 'dzin gyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the superknowledges is not the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin ma yin no //üîΩgzungs kyi sgo'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ma yin no // gzungs kyi sgo'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /

original: gzungs kyi sgo ma yin no //üîΩde bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo ma yin no // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways is not the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin no // mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas is not the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma yin no //üîΩso so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma yin no // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the four fearlessnesses is not the four fearlessnesses.

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma yin no // snying rje chen po'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /

original: snying rje chen po ma yin no //
analyzed: snying rje chen po ma yin no //

original: sangs @533a *// rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sangs @533a *// rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin no //üîΩthams cad shes pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin no // thams cad shes pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /

original: thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The profundity of the knowledge of all aspects is not the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /üîΩlam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no; ;rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no; ;rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The profundity of the knowledge of the aspects of the path is not the knowledge of the aspects of the path.üîΩThe profundity of the knowledge of all bases is not the knowledge of all bases.üîΩThe profundity of the knowledge of paths is not the knowledge of paths.üîΩThe profundity of the knowledge of all entities is not the knowledge of all entities.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no //

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

original: gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: If one does not practice with the idea that the ear consciousness element is immeasurable,üîΩone practices the perfection of wisdom.üîΩIf one does not practice with the idea that the ear contact element is immeasurable,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

original: gal te lce'i rnam @534a *//
analyzed: gal te lce'i rnam @534a *//
translated: If one does not practice with the idea that the nose element is immeasurable,üîΩone practices the perfection of wisdom.üîΩIf one does not practice with the idea that the smell element is immeasurable,üîΩone practices the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: par shes pa tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

translated: The immeasurability of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact via the coming together of body isüîΩ

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //üîΩyid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the body is not the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no //üîΩsa'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no // sa'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the mind is not the feeling that arises from the condition of contact with the mind.

original: sa'i khams ma yin no //üîΩchu'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sa'i khams ma yin no // chu'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the earth element is not the earth element.

original: chu'i khams ma yin no //üîΩme'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chu'i khams ma yin no // me'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the water element is not the water element.

original: me'i khams ma yin no //üîΩrlung gi khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: me'i khams ma yin no // rlung gi khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the fire element is not the fire element.

original: @539a *// rlung gi khams ma yin no //üîΩnam mkha'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: @539a *// rlung gi khams ma yin no // nam mkha'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the wind element is not the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams ma yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ma yin no //
translated: The immeasurability of the space element is not the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /üîΩrnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no //üîΩma rig pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni / rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no // ma rig pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the consciousness element is not the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa ma yin no //üîΩ'du byed kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ma rig pa ma yin no // 'du byed kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of ignorance is not ignorance.

original: 'du byed ma yin no //üîΩrnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'du byed ma yin no // rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of volitional factors is not volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa ma yin no //üîΩming dang gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma yin no // ming dang gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of consciousness is not consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs ma yin no //üîΩskye mched drug gi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ma yin no // skye mched drug gi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of name-and-form is not name-and-form.

original: skye mched drug ma yin no //üîΩreg pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: skye mched drug ma yin no // reg pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the six sense spheres is not the six sense spheres.

original: reg pa ma yin no //üîΩtshor ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: reg pa ma yin no // tshor ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of contact is not contact.

original: tshor ba ma yin no //üîΩsred pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshor ba ma yin no // sred pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of feeling is not feeling.

original: sred pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sred pa ma yin no //
translated: The immeasurability of craving is not craving.

original: len pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: len pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of appropriation is not appropriation.

original: len pa ma yin no //
analyzed: len pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not grasping.

original: srid pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni; srid pa ma yin no //üîΩskye ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: srid pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni; srid pa ma yin no // skye ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of existence is not existence.

original: skye ba ma yin no //üîΩrga shi'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: skye ba ma yin no // rga shi'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of birth is not birth.

original: rga shi ma yin no //üîΩsbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rga shi ma yin no // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of old age and death is not old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //üîΩtshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //üîΩbzod @539b pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no // bzod @539b pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the perfection of discipline is not the perfection of discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //üîΩbrtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the perfection of patience is not the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: The immeasurability of the perfection of diligence is not the perfection of diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the perfection of meditative stability is as follows.üîΩ

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //üîΩshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurables of the perfection of meditative stability are not the perfection of meditative stability.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //üîΩnang stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no // nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurables of the perfection of wisdom are not the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩphyi stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ma yin no // phyi stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurables of inner emptiness are not inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩphyi nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no // phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurables of outer emptiness are not outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩstong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurables of inner and outer emptiness are not inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩchen po stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no // chen po stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurables of the emptiness of emptiness are not the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The immeasurables of great emptiness are not great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the emptiness of the ultimate

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the emptiness of the conditioned

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the emptiness of the unconditioned

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang @540a *//üîΩyin pa de ni /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang @540a *// yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the emptiness of what is neither unarisen nor destroyed

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of what is neither unarisen nor destroyed.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the emptiness of nonrejection

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of nonrejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of emptiness by nature is as follows.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩchos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no // chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the emptiness of inherent existence is not the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩrang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the emptiness of its own mark is not the emptiness of its own mark.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩdngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the emptiness of non-apprehension is not the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the emptiness of non-things is not the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The immeasurability of the emptiness of essential nature is not the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the applications of mindfulness

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: is not the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the right efforts

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no //
translated: is not the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the legs of miraculous power

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: is not the legs of miraculous power.

original: dbang po rnams kyi tshad med @540b pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi tshad med @540b pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the faculties

original: dbang po rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po rnams ma yin no //
translated: is not the faculties.

original: stobs rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the powers

original: stobs rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: stobs rnams ma yin no //
translated: is not the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the branches of enlightenmentüîΩis not the branches of enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no //
translated: are not the limbs of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the eightfold noble path

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no //
translated: is not the eightfold noble path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the four truths of the noble ones

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: is not the four truths of the noble ones.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the dhyƒÅnas

original: bsam gtan rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ma yin no //
translated: is not the dhyƒÅnas.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the immeasurables

original: tshad med pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: is not the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the formless absorptions

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: is not the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the eight deliverances

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: is not the deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurables of the nine serial absorptions

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: are not the serial absorptions.üîΩThe immeasurables of the emptiness gate of liberation,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: signless gate of liberation, and wishless gate of liberation

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no //
translated: are not the emptiness gate of liberation, signless gate of liberation, and wishless gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang @541a *//üîΩyin pa de ni /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang @541a *// yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurables of the higher perceptions

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: are not the higher perceptions.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurables of the meditative stabilizations

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no //
translated: are not the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurables of the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no //
translated: are not the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurables of the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatasüîΩare not the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no //
translated: It is not the powers of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the four fearlessnesses

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: is not the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the four detailed and thorough knowledges

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: is not the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: snying rje chen po'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of great compassion

original: snying rje chen po ma yin no //
analyzed: snying rje chen po ma yin no //
translated: is not great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: is not the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The immeasurability of the knowledge of all aspects

original: thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no //

original: bdag kyang gzhon nu'i sa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin la /üîΩgzhan yang gzhon nu'i sa phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo //
analyzed: bdag kyang gzhon nu'i sa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin la / gzhan yang gzhon nu'i sa phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo //

analyzed: gzhan yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la yang dag par skul lo //

analyzed: bdag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga sgom la /

original: bdag kyang @550a *//
analyzed: bdag kyang @550a *//
translated: ‚ÄúThey themselves cultivate the four fearlessnesses,üîΩand they encourage others to cultivate the four fearlessnesses.üîΩ‚ÄúThey themselves cultivate the four special knowledges,
